notes.text:
An update is available for rhel-system-roles.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The rhel-system-roles package includes a collection of Ansible roles and modules that provide a stable and consistent configuration interface for managing multiple versions of Rocky Linux.

Bug Fix(es):

* Setup imuxsock using rhel-system-roles.logging causing an error EL8 (JIRA:Rocky Linux-37550)

* fix: Set user.cfg path to /boot/grub2/ on EL 9 UEFI [rhel-8] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-45711)

* redhat.rhel_system_roles.podman fails to configure and run containers with podman rootless using different username and groupname. [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58460)

* package rhel-system-roles.noarch does not provide docs for ansible-doc [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58465)

* rhel-system-role.storage is not idempotent [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58469)

* second SSHD service broken [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58473)

* [RFE] Add the umask settings or enable a variable in linux-system-roles.logging [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58477)

* redhat.rhel_system_roles.logging role fails to process logging_outputs: of type: "custom" [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58481)

* RFE - system-roles - logging: Add truncate options for local file inputs [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58485)

* System Roles: No module documentation [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58489)

* fix: Sets domain name lower case in realmd.conf section header [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58494)

* fix: use correct user for cancel linger file name [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58498)

* fix: do not use become for changing hostdir ownership, and expose subuid/subgid info [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58503)

* Create podman secret when skip_existing=True and it does not exist [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58507)

* fix: grab name of network to remove from quadlet file [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58511)

* cockpit install all wildcard match does not work in newer el9 [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58515)

* feat: Allow initrd configuration to be skipped [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58519)

* fix: proper cleanup for networks; ensure cleanup of resources [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58525)

* bootloader role tests do not work on ostree [rhel-8.10.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-58917)

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RLEA-2024:8840
